#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
//#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,n,i,f,d,val,wt,j;
	int a[10010];
	
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d%d",&i,&f);
		d=f-i;
			for(j=0;j!=10010;j++)
			a[j]=32767;
		
		scanf("%d",&n);
		for(i=0;i!=n;i++)
		{
			
		
			
			scanf("%d%d",&val,&wt);
			
			if(a[wt]>val)
			{
			a[wt]=val;
			
				for(j=wt+1;j<=d;j++)
				{
					if(a[wt] + a[j-wt] < a[j])
					a[j]=a[wt]+a[j-wt];
				}
				
			}
			}
			
			if(a[d]==32767)
			 cout<<"This is impossible."<<endl;
       else
       cout<<"The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is "<<a[d]<<"."<<endl;
  
  }
    return 0;
}
